SUMMER STEM INTERNSHIPS (LEAH)

  • Home
  • Opportunities
  • SUMMER STEM INTERNSHIPS (LEAH)

SUMMER STEM INTERNSHIPS (LEAH)

LEAH PROJECT

to Favourites

Program Length:

Summer: July 12th-August 13th (5 days/week)

School Year: October-June (3-4 days/week)

Location: opportunities offered take place in Boston

Admissions Req: This STEM internship is open to and rising 10th-12th graders in the Boston area. Students of color (Black/African American, Latino, Asian American, Native American, Multi-Racial, etc.) are heavily encouraged to apply.

Highlight: Calling all STEM enthusiasts! LEAH Project is looking to help underrepresented groups interested in the STEM field through a PAID Internship! With this STEM internship, students will be able to learn more about the STEM professions through field trips, shadowing, career nights, and research. This STEM internship will equip you with everything you need to know for your future career. Did we mention, you can earn 2K-3K? Getting paid to learn seems like a good deal? Why not apply to this STEM internship.

Financial: Paid internship. Students can earn $2000-$3000. Cost is free.
